author: Carol Burnett
content: Only I can change my life. No one can do it for me.

author: Charles R. Swindoll
content: Life is 10% what happens to you and 90% how you react to it.

author: George Sand
content: There is only one happiness in this life, to love and be loved.

author: Simone de Beauvoir
content: Change your life today. Don't gamble on the future, act now, without delay.

author: Hubert H. Humphrey
content: The greatest gift of life is friendship, and I have received it.

author: Thich Nhat Hanh
content: Because of your smile, you make life more beautiful.

author: Matt Cameron
content: Live life to the fullest, and focus on the positive.

author: Robert Frost
content: In three words I can sum up everything I've learned about life: it goes on.

author: John W. Gardner
content: Life is the art of drawing without an eraser.

author: Kareena Kapoor Khan
content: Life is full of happiness and tears; be strong and have faith.

author: Omar Khayyam
content: Be happy for this moment. This moment is your life.

author: Oprah Winfrey
content: The biggest adventure you can take is to live the life of your dreams.

author: Albert Einstein
content: Life is like riding a bicycle. To keep your balance, you must keep moving.

author: John Dewey
content: Education is not preparation for life; education is life itself.

author: Elbert Hubbard
content: Do not take life too seriously. You will never get out of it alive.

author: Magdalena Neuner
content: My life motto is 'Do my best, so that I can't blame myself for anything.'

author: Confucius
content: Life is really simple, but we insist on making it complicated.

author: Avril Lavigne
content: Life is like a roller coaster, live it, be happy, enjoy life.

author: Sara Paretsky
content: I'm lucky in having found the perfect partner to spend my life with.

author: Willie Nelson
content: When I started counting my blessings, my whole life turned around.

author: Publilius Syrus
content: Good health and good sense are two of life's greatest blessings.

author: Mark Twain
content: Good friends, good books and a sleepy conscience: this is the ideal life.

author: Mahatma Gandhi
content: Where there is love there is life.

author: Buddha
content: Just as a candle cannot burn without fire, men cannot live without a spiritual life.

author: Jean de La Fontaine
content: Friendship is the shadow of the evening, which increases with the setting sun of life.

author: Gary Allan
content: Life ain't always beautiful, but it's a beautiful ride.

author: Paulo Coelho
content: Life was always a matter of waiting for the right moment to act.

author: Khalid
content: Positivity, confidence, and persistence are key in life, so never give up on yourself.

author: Chris Rock
content: There are only three things women need in life: food, water, and compliments.

author: Karolina Kurkova
content: Simply enjoy life and the great pleasures that come with it.

author: Pablo Picasso
content: The purpose of art is washing the dust of daily life off our souls.

author: Victor Hugo
content: Concision in style, precision in thought, decision in life.

author: John Scalzi
content: Do what you need to do and enjoy life as it happens.

author: Mark Twain
content: All you need in this life is ignorance and confidence, and then success is sure.

author: George Eliot
content: Life began with waking up and loving my mother's face.

author: Christopher Morley
content: A man who has never made a woman angry is a failure in life.

author: Iain Duncan Smith
content: Luck is great, but most of life is hard work.

author: Immanuel Kant
content: Science is organized knowledge. Wisdom is organized life.

author: Hugh Prather
content: Just when I think I have learned the way to live, life changes.

author: Sophocles
content: Children are the anchors that hold a mother to life.

author: Louis Tomlinson
content: Live life for the moment because everything else is uncertain!

author: Marcus Tullius Cicero
content: The life of the dead is placed in the memory of the living.

author: Charles M. Schulz
content: Life is like a ten speed bicycle. Most of us have gears we never use.

author: Barbara Bush
content: I think togetherness is a very important ingredient to family life.

author: Khalil Gibran
content: For life and death are one, even as the river and the sea are one.

author: Romy Schneider
content: Memories are the best things in life, I think.

author: Miley Cyrus
content: Life is all about having a good time.

author: Elayne Boosler
content: My fashion philosophy is, if you're not covered in dog hair, your life is empty.

author: A. P. J. Abdul Kalam
content: The bird is powered by its own life and by its motivation.

author: Ronald Reagan
content: Life is one grand, sweet song, so start the music.

author: Joyce Meyer
content: You cannot have a positive life and a negative mind.

author: Stephen Hawking
content: However difficult life may seem, there is always something you can do and succeed at.

author: Rufus Wainwright
content: Life is a game and true love is a trophy.

author: David Duchovny
content: The happiest moment of my life was probably when my daughter was born.

author: Teri Garr
content: Take a step back, evaluate what is important, and enjoy life.

author: Muhammad Ali
content: He who is not courageous enough to take risks will accomplish nothing in life.

author: Ridley Scott
content: Life isn't black and white. It's a million gray areas, don't you find?

author: Oscar Wilde
content: If you are not too long, I will wait here for you all my life.

author: Lil Wayne
content: I like people that enjoy life, 'cause I do the same.

author: Sylvia Earle
content: No water, no life. No blue, no green.

author: Scott Hamilton
content: The only disability in life is a bad attitude.

author: Ann Landers
content: Nobody gets to live life backward. Look ahead, that is where your future lies.

author: Michael Franti
content: No life's worth more than any other, no sister worth less than any brother.

author: Kenneth H. Cooper
content: The reason I exercise is for the quality of life I enjoy.

author: Brooke Shields
content: Smoking kills. If you're killed, you've lost a very important part of your life.

author: Neale Donald Walsch
content: Life begins at the end of your comfort zone.

author: Marc Anthony
content: If you do what you love, you'll never work a day in your life.

author: Sarah Louise Delany
content: Life is short, and it is up to you to make it sweet.

author: Victor Hugo
content: Life is the flower for which love is the honey.

author: Bertrand Russell
content: The good life is one inspired by love and guided by knowledge.

author: Pat Conroy
content: Without music, life is a journey through a desert.

author: Simone de Beauvoir
content: I wish that every human life might be pure transparent freedom.

author: Phillips Brooks
content: Be patient and understanding. Life is too short to be vengeful or malicious.

author: Soren Kierkegaard
content: Life can only be understood backwards; but it must be lived forwards.

author: Albert Schweitzer
content: There are two means of refuge from the miseries of life: music and cats.

author: George Takei
content: I intend to live life, not just exist.

author: David L. Wolper
content: Relax! Life is beautiful!

author: Big Boi
content: Life moves so fast. You gotta document the good times, man.

author: Josephine de La Baume
content: You can really only enjoy life when you're extremely busy.

author: Vanessa Paradis
content: Life is like the ocean, it goes up and down.

author: Bobby Brown
content: I feel that the simplicity of life is just being yourself.

author: Helen Keller
content: Life is either a great adventure or nothing.

author: Elizabeth Kenny
content: It's better to be a lion for a day than a sheep all your life.

author: Tracy McMillan
content: Caring - about people, about things, about life - is an act of maturity.

author: George Bernard Shaw
content: Alcohol is the anesthesia by which we endure the operation of life.

author: Jurgen Klopp
content: Life is too short not to celebrate nice moments!

author: John de Mol, Jr.
content: You learn more about life from watching 'Big Brother' than from reading a book.

author: Pope Francis
content: Life is a journey. When we stop, things don't go right.

author: W. E. B. Du Bois
content: Education must not simply teach work - it must teach Life.

author: Regina Brett
content: No one really has a bad life. Not even a bad day. Just bad moments.

author: Ludwig van Beethoven
content: Music is the mediator between the spiritual and the sensual life.

author: John Wooden
content: Whatever you do in life, surround yourself with smart people who'll argue with you.

author: Tori Amos
content: Being stylish is about enjoying your life and expressing yourself and your inner light.

author: Friedrich Nietzsche
content: He who has a why to live can bear almost any how.

author: Boris Pasternak
content: Surprise is the greatest gift which life can grant us.

author: Bob Marley
content: Open your eyes, look within. Are you satisfied with the life you're living?

author: Katharine Hepburn
content: Life is hard. After all, it kills you.

author: Hans Christian Andersen
content: Life itself is the most wonderful fairy tale.

author: Caroline Shaw
content: Be free, and live life fully.

author: Joseph Addison
content: Reading is a basic tool in the living of a good life.

author: Steve Jobs
content: Sometimes life hits you in the head with a brick. Don't lose faith.

author: Gavin Rossdale
content: A happy wife is a happy life.

author: Joe Biden
content: Failure at some point in your life is inevitable, but giving up is unforgivable.

author: Marcus Aurelius
content: Our life is what our thoughts make it.

author: Jeanne Calment
content: Always keep your smile. That's how I explain my long life.

author: Carol Burnett
content: Words, once they are printed, have a life of their own.

author: Cristiano Ronaldo
content: Without football, my life is worth nothing.

author: Lindsey Vonn
content: It's amazing. Life changes very quickly, in a very positive way, if you let it.

author: Jackie Robinson
content: A life is not important except in the impact it has on other lives.

author: Henry David Thoreau
content: The price of anything is the amount of life you exchange for it.

author: Albert Einstein
content: Without deep reflection one knows from daily life that one exists for other people.

author: John Lennon
content: Life is what happens while you are busy making other plans.

author: John Barth
content: Everyone is necessarily the hero of his own life story.

author: Carolyn Gold Heilbrun
content: Romance is the glamour which turns the dust of everyday life into a golden haze.

author: Marcus Aurelius
content: Life is neither good or evil, but only a place for good and evil.

author: Lao Tzu
content: Life and death are one thread, the same line viewed from different sides.

author: Danny Meyer
content: Life is a series of waves to be embraced and overcome.

author: Carla Gugino
content: My favorite thing is to have a big dinner with friends and talk about life.

author: Ella Woodward
content: When life gives you Monday, dip it in glitter and sparkle all day.

author: Hugh Mackay
content: Nothing is perfect. Life is messy. Relationships are complex. Outcomes are uncertain. People are irrational.

author: Nas
content: I just enjoy life now. I just enjoy every morning I get to wake up.

author: Winston Churchill
content: You have enemies? Good. That means you've stood up for something, sometime in your life.

author: Mary McGarry Morris
content: I'm a quiet person, and I live a quiet, pleasant, ordinary, simple life.

author: Francis Bacon
content: A bachelor's life is a fine breakfast, a flat lunch, and a miserable dinner.

author: Dick Clark
content: Music is the soundtrack of your life.

author: Orhan Pamuk
content: Life is short, and we should respect every moment of it.

author: William James
content: Believe that life is worth living and your belief will help create the fact.

author: Lucius Annaeus Seneca
content: A happy life is one which is in accordance with its own nature.

author: Leo Tolstoy
content: The sole meaning of life is to serve humanity.

author: Paul Cezanne
content: We live in a rainbow of chaos.

author: Morris West
content: If you spend your whole life waiting for the storm, you'll never enjoy the sunshine.

author: Muhammad Ali
content: Old age is just a record of one's whole life.

author: Khalil Gibran
content: Life without love is like a tree without blossoms or fruit.

author: Laura Ingalls Wilder
content: It is the sweet, simple things of life which are the real ones after all.

author: Donald Trump
content: My whole life is about winning. I don't lose often. I almost never lose.

author: Henry Ward Beecher
content: A library is not a luxury but one of the necessities of life.

author: Martin Luther King, Jr.
content: Life's most persistent and urgent question is, 'What are you doing for others?'

author: Douglas Wilson
content: Use plants to bring life.

author: Alejandro Gonzalez Inarritu
content: Life and death are illusions. We are in a constant state of transformation.

author: Tamara Mellon
content: My daughter is my passion and my life.

author: Charlie Chaplin
content: Life could be wonderful if people would leave you alone.

author: Henry Wadsworth Longfellow
content: Into each life some rain must fall.

author: Shah Rukh Khan
content: Success and failure are both part of life. Both are not permanent.

author: Kim Kardashian
content: It's fun to have a partner who understands your life and lets you be you.

author: Carly Fiorina
content: Life is measured in love and positive contributions and moments of grace.

author: Elon Musk
content: Life is too short for long-term grudges.

author: Vicki Lawrence
content: Life is much too serious to be taken seriously.

author: Arnold H. Glasow
content: Telling a teenager the facts of life is like giving a fish a bath.

author: Audrey Hepburn
content: Water is life, and clean water means health.

author: Albert Einstein
content: The monotony and solitude of a quiet life stimulates the creative mind.

author: Lionel Messi
content: There are more important things in life than winning or losing a game.

author: Jim Henson
content: Life's like a movie, write your own ending. Keep believing, keep pretending.

author: Juliette Binoche
content: What I love most about this crazy life is the adventure of it.

author: Anne Hathaway
content: Weddings are important because they celebrate life and possibility.

author: Leonardo da Vinci
content: As a well-spent day brings happy sleep, so a life well spent brings happy death.

author: Prince William
content: My guiding principles in life are to be honest, genuine, thoughtful and caring.

author: Socrates
content: Beware the barrenness of a busy life.

author: Kimberly Elise
content: I live a very joyful life, with a lot of laughter and good times.

author: Stephen Covey
content: There are three constants in life... change, choice and principles.

author: Cesare Pavese
content: We do not remember days, we remember moments.

author: Mort Sahl
content: My life needs editing.

author: Vincent Van Gogh
content: What would life be if we had no courage to attempt anything?

author: Jack Kerouac
content: Maybe that's what life is... a wink of the eye and winking stars.

author: Arthur Rubinstein
content: I have found that if you love life, life will love you back.

author: Eckhart Tolle
content: Life is an adventure, it's not a package tour.

author: Kid Cudi
content: My life is like a speeding bullet that just hasn't hit the target yet.

author: L. Ron Hubbard
content: Never regret yesterday. Life is in you today and you make your tomorrow.

author: Isaac Asimov
content: Life is pleasant. Death is peaceful. It's the transition that's troublesome.

author: Edwin Markham
content: The crest and crowning of all good, Life's final star, is brotherhood.

author: Matt Groening
content: Here's to alcohol: the cause of, and answer to, all of life's problems.

author: Charlie Chaplin
content: Life is a tragedy when seen in close-up, but a comedy in long-shot.

author: Claude Pepper
content: Life is like riding a bicycle: you don't fall off unless you stop pedaling.

author: Friedrich Nietzsche
content: Without music, life would be a mistake.

author: Socrates
content: The unexamined life is not worth living.

author: George Bernard Shaw
content: Life isn't about finding yourself. Life is about creating yourself.

author: Karan Patel
content: I am blessed with a funny gene that makes me enjoy life.

author: Carl Sandburg
content: A baby is God's opinion that life should go on.

author: Arthur Rubinstein
content: Even when I'm sick and depressed, I love life.

author: Gene Simmons
content: I don't wait for the calendar to figure out when I should live life.

author: Napoleon Hill
content: It takes half your life before you discover life is a do-it-yourself project.

author: Stephen Hawking
content: Life would be tragic if it weren't funny.

author: Rollo May
content: Life comes from physical survival; but the good life comes from what we care about.

author: George Eliot
content: The beginning of compunction is the beginning of a new life.

author: Post Malone
content: You just got with the flow because life is just all about how you feel.

author: Esme Bianco
content: You can't get anywhere in life without taking risks.

author: Michael Imperioli
content: I do smoke in real life. A lot. We're all smoking right now in fact.

author: Lillian Gish
content: A happy life is one spent in learning, earning, and yearning.

author: Soren Kierkegaard
content: Life is not a problem to be solved, but a reality to be experienced.

author: Shel Silverstein
content: Comfortable shoes and the freedom to leave are the two most important things in life.

author: Lord Byron
content: The great art of life is sensation, to feel that we exist, even in pain.

author: Roy Ayers
content: I don't trip on that much. I just like to enjoy life and be happy.

author: Logan Pearsall Smith
content: People say that life is the thing, but I prefer reading.

author: Gza
content: Live a life full of humility, gratitude, intellectual curiosity, and never stop learning.

author: Benjamin Franklin
content: Life's tragedy is that we get old too soon and wise too late.

author: Isabel Allende
content: My life is about ups and downs, great joys and great losses.

author: Douglas Coupland
content: Flying dreams mean that you're doing the right thing with your life.

author: Dianne Reeves
content: Even in a world with much sadness, at its essence, life is beautiful.

author: Swami Sivananda
content: Today is your own. Tomorrow perchance may never come.

author: Corazon Aquino
content: I would rather die a meaningful death than to live a meaningless life.

author: Rihanna
content: I'm really looking forward to seeing what life brings to me.

author: Amitabh Bachchan
content: Life is a blur when one is essaying different roles; it is so fulfilling.

author: Carol Burnett
content: I'm so happy with what has happened in my life.

author: William Cowper
content: Variety's the very spice of life, That gives it all its flavor.

author: Soren Kierkegaard
content: Our life always expresses the result of our dominant thoughts.

author: Don Miguel Ruiz
content: Every human is an artist. The dream of your life is to make beautiful art.

author: Dalai Lama
content: The purpose of our lives is to be happy.

author: Richard E. Grant
content: Never give up. You only get one life. Go for it!

author: Marilyn Monroe
content: Sometimes I feel my whole life has been one big rejection.

author: Robert Kurson
content: It's never too late in life to have a genuine adventure.

author: Joseph Campbell
content: The privilege of a lifetime is being who you are.

author: Valentino Rossi
content: My normal life is like being on holiday.

author: Harvey Mackay
content: A student of life considers the world a classroom.

author: Josh Billings
content: Life consists not in holding good cards but in playing those you hold well.

author: Plato
content: Life must be lived as play.

author: Jean Paul
content: Music is moonlight in the gloomy night of life.

author: Steve Jobs
content: I believe life is an intelligent thing: that things aren't random.

author: Channing Tatum
content: Life is too short to miss out on the beautiful things like a double cheeseburger.

author: Eleanor Roosevelt
content: If life were predictable it would cease to be life, and be without flavor.

author: Mahatma Gandhi
content: There is more to life than increasing its speed.

author: George Sand
content: Life in common among people who love each other is the ideal of happiness.

author: Ralph Waldo Emerson
content: All life is an experiment. The more experiments you make the better.

author: Rebecca Pidgeon
content: Contemplate the good things in your life and be grateful for them.

author: Carol Burnett
content: Because nobody goes through life without a scar.

author: Johann Wolfgang von Goethe
content: All theory, dear friend, is gray, but the golden tree of life springs ever green.

author: Zoe Foster Blake
content: We live a happy life, and we don't take anything too seriously.

author: Martin Luther King, Jr.
content: The quality, not the longevity, of one's life is what is important.

author: Orlando Bloom
content: I just want to have a nice, happy life.

author: Tim Tebow
content: I really try to enjoy life and have joy with what I do.

author: Emily Dickinson
content: Find ecstasy in life; the mere sense of living is joy enough.

author: Donald Trump
content: Everything in life is luck.

author: Wayne Dyer
content: Doing what you love is the cornerstone of having abundance in your life.

author: Maya Angelou
content: There is a very fine line between loving life and being greedy for it.

author: Emily Dickinson
content: That it will never come again is what makes life sweet.

author: Henry David Thoreau
content: To affect the quality of the day, that is the highest of arts.

author: Robert Fulghum
content: All I really need to know... I learned in kindergarten.

author: Leo Tolstoy
content: True life is lived when tiny changes occur.

author: Irving Berlin
content: Life is 10 percent what you make it, and 90 percent how you take it.

author: Amos Bronson Alcott
content: The less routine the more life.

author: Oscar Wilde
content: Life is far too important a thing ever to talk seriously about.

author: William Wallace
content: Every man dies. Not every man really lives.

author: Peter De Vries
content: Life is a zoo in a jungle.

author: Tom Felton
content: Whatever life throws at me I'll take it and be grateful for it as well.

author: James M. Barrie
content: Life is a long lesson in humility.

author: Mark Twain
content: When we remember we are all mad, the mysteries disappear and life stands explained.

author: Geoffrey Rush
content: I always had a fantasy of being a chef, because I like kitchen life.

author: Arthur Miller
content: Maybe all one can do is hope to end up with the right regrets.

author: Isaac Bashevis Singer
content: Kindness, I've discovered, is everything in life.

author: Mahatma Gandhi
content: My life is my message.

author: Marcus Aurelius
content: The art of living is more like wrestling than dancing.

author: Bob Dylan
content: He not busy being born is busy dying.

author: Rabindranath Tagore
content: We live in the world when we love it.

author: Robert Herrick
content: The person lives twice who lives the first life well.

author: Frank Lloyd Wright
content: Give me the luxuries of life and I will willingly do without the necessities.

author: Rose Kennedy
content: Life isn't a matter of milestones, but of moments.

author: Socrates
content: Not life, but good life, is to be chiefly valued.

author: Oscar Wilde
content: Life imitates art far more than art imitates Life.

author: Ralph Waldo Emerson
content: With the past, I have nothing to do; nor with the future. I live now.

author: George Gershwin
content: Life is a lot like jazz... it's best when you improvise.

author: Ralph Waldo Emerson
content: It is not length of life, but depth of life.

author: Woody Allen
content: Seventy percent of success in life is showing up.

author: Marcus Tullius Cicero
content: While there's life, there's hope.

author: Anais Nin
content: The personal life deeply lived always expands into truths beyond itself.

author: Johann Wolfgang von Goethe
content: Character develops itself in the stream of life.

author: Samuel Butler
content: Life is the art of drawing sufficient conclusions from insufficient premises.

author: Oliver Goldsmith
content: You can preach a better sermon with your life than with your lips.

author: Louis Armstrong
content: What we play is life.

author: Craig Venter
content: Life is a DNA software system.

author: Horace
content: Life is largely a matter of expectation.

author: Charlotte Bronte
content: Life appears to me too short to be spent in nursing animosity, or registering wrongs.

author: Zhuangzi
content: Life comes from the earth and life returns to the earth.

author: John Henry Newman
content: To live is to change, and to be perfect is to have changed often.

author: Tennessee Williams
content: To be free is to have achieved your life.

author: Dustin Hoffman
content: The two basic items necessary to sustain life are sunshine and coconut milk.

author: Ralph Waldo Emerson
content: Life consists in what a man is thinking of all day.

author: Euripides
content: The greatest pleasure of life is love.

author: Helen Hayes
content: The hardest years in life are those between ten and seventy.

author: Henri Frederic Amiel
content: The best path through life is the highway.

author: Alice Roosevelt Longworth
content: I have a simple philosophy: Fill what's empty. Empty what's full. Scratch where it itches.

author: William Feather
content: No man is a failure who is enjoying life.

author: Jackie Kennedy
content: I want to live my life, not record it.

author: Emily Dickinson
content: To live is so startling it leaves little time for anything else.

author: Jean-Paul Sartre
content: Everything has been figured out, except how to live.

author: Lauryn Hill
content: We can't plan life. All we can do is be available for it.

author: Sidonie Gabrielle Colette
content: What a wonderful life I've had! I only wish I'd realized it sooner.

author: Douglas MacArthur
content: Life is a lively process of becoming.

author: Julia Child
content: Life itself is the proper binge.

author: Euripides
content: There is just one life for each of us: our own.

author: Anne Morrow Lindbergh
content: The most exhausting thing in life is being insincere.

author: Alexis Carrel
content: Life leaps like a geyser for those who drill through the rock of inertia.

author: Brendan Gill
content: Not a shred of evidence exists in favor of the idea that life is serious.

author: George A. Moore
content: The difficulty in life is the choice.

author: Jean Anouilh
content: Our entire life - consists ultimately in accepting ourselves as we are.

author: Gilbert Parker
content: The real business of life is trying to understand each other.

author: Theodor W. Adorno
content: Wrong life cannot be lived rightly.

author: Robert James Waller
content: Life is never easy for those who dream.

author: George Herbert
content: Life is half spent before we know what it is.

author: Amelia Barr
content: With renunciation life begins.

author: Albert Einstein
content: Only a life lived for others is a life worthwhile.

author: Henry David Thoreau
content: Our truest life is when we are in dreams awake.

author: William Shakespeare
content: I bear a charmed life.

author: Friedrich Nietzsche
content: Art is the proper task of life.

author: Maya Angelou
content: Life loves the liver of it.

author: George Eliot
content: What do we live for, if not to make life less difficult for each other?

author: Robert Byrne
content: The purpose of life is a life of purpose.

author: Marcus Aurelius
content: Execute every act of thy life as though it were thy last.

author: Novalis
content: Only an artist can interpret the meaning of life.

author: Leonardo da Vinci
content: Just as courage imperils life, fear protects it.

author: Rainer Maria Rilke
content: Let life happen to you. Believe me: life is in the right, always.

author: Leonardo da Vinci
content: Life well spent is long.

author: Anais Nin
content: People living deeply have no fear of death.

author: Seneca
content: Begin at once to live, and count each separate day as a separate life.

author: Lucius Annaeus Seneca
content: While we are postponing, life speeds by.

author: Will Rogers
content: We are all here for a spell, get all the good laughs you can.

author: Johann Wolfgang von Goethe
content: What is important in life is life, and not the result of life.

author: Henri Nouwen
content: The greatest trap in our life is not success, popularity or power, but self-rejection.

author: Marcus Tullius Cicero
content: To live is to think.

author: George Whitefield
content: Take care of your life and the Lord will take care of your death.

author: Henri Frederic Amiel
content: The man who has no inner-life is a slave to his surroundings.

author: Peter Diamandis
content: Nothing is more precious than life... especially the life of your child.

author: William James
content: This life is worth living, we can say, since it is what we make it.

author: Joel Osteen
content: Life's a fight. It's a good fight of faith.

author: O. Henry
content: Life is made up of sobs, sniffles, and smiles, with sniffles predominating.

author: Horace
content: Remember when life's path is steep to keep your mind even.

author: Emily Dickinson
content: I argue thee that love is life. And life hath immortality.

author: Alfred Adler
content: The chief danger in life is that you may take too many precautions.

author: Truman Capote
content: Life is a moderately good play with a badly written third act.

author: Vivien Leigh
content: Life is too short to work so hard.

author: Nathaniel Hawthorne
content: Life is made up of marble and mud.

author: Grandma Moses
content: Life is what we make it, always has been, always will be.

author: Desiderius Erasmus
content: To know nothing is the happiest life.

author: Fran Lebowitz
content: Life is something to do when you can't get to sleep.

author: Robert Louis Stevenson
content: An aim in life is the only fortune worth finding.

author: Douglas Adams
content: Life is wasted on the living.

author: e. e. cummings
content: Unbeing dead isn't being alive.

author: Corita Kent
content: Life is a succession of moments, to live each one is to succeed.

author: Michel de Montaigne
content: My trade and art is to live.

author: Mignon McLaughlin
content: For the happiest life, days should be rigorously planned, nights left open to chance.

author: John Henry Newman
content: Growth is the only evidence of life.

author: Karen Horney
content: Life itself still remains a very effective therapist.

author: Oliver Wendell Holmes, Jr.
content: Life is painting a picture, not doing a sum.

author: Elizabeth Gaskell
content: A little credulity helps one on through life very smoothly.

author: Samuel Smiles
content: Life will always be to a large extent what we ourselves make it.

author: John Cleese
content: You don't have to be the Dalai Lama to tell people that life's about change.

author: Anne Morrow Lindbergh
content: Life is a gift, given in trust - like a child.

author: Publilius Syrus
content: Each day is the scholar of yesterday.

author: Stephen Jay Gould
content: We pass through this world but once.

author: Jackie Gleason
content: How sweet it is!

author: John Ruskin
content: There is no wealth but life.

author: Eric Butterworth
content: Don't go through life, grow through life.

author: Jean Ingelow
content: A healthful hunger for a great idea is the beauty and blessedness of life.

author: Andrew Lang
content: Life's more amusing than we thought.

author: Robert Hall
content: We are to seek wisdom and understanding only in the length of days.

author: George Lucas
content: I am simply trying to struggle through life; trying to do God's bidding.

author: Anthony Hopkins
content: I love life because what more is there?

author: Dave Barry
content: Life is anything that dies when you stomp on it.

author: Emile Zola
content: I am an artist... I am here to live out loud.

author: Jeff Rich
content: Life is a work in progress.

author: Jose Ortega y Gasset
content: I am I plus my circumstances.

author: Jose Ortega y Gasset
content: We cannot put off living until we are ready.

author: Karl A. Menninger
content: Unrest of spirit is a mark of life.

author: Tom Wilson
content: Nobody got where they are today by living for tomorrow.

author: Matthew Arnold
content: Conduct is three-fourths of our life and its largest concern.

author: E. M. Forster
content: The main facts in human life are five: birth, food, sleep, love and death.

author: William Lyon Phelps
content: The fear of life is the favorite disease of the 20th century.

author: Ursula Andress
content: I take care of my flowers and my cats. And enjoy food. And that's living.

author: Lillie Langtry
content: I do not regret one moment of my life.

author: John Clare
content: If life had a second edition, how I would correct the proofs.

author: Havelock Ellis
content: Pain and death are part of life. To reject them is to reject life itself.

author: Jean Paul
content: Every man regards his own life as the New Year's Eve of time.

author: Samuel Butler
content: Life is not an exact science, it is an art.

author: Jean Cocteau
content: Life is a horizontal fall.

author: William Ellery Channing
content: Life has a higher end, than to be amused.

author: Edward Fitzgerald
content: I am all for the short and merry life.

author: Judy Collins
content: I have inspiration and feelings of being alive most every day I live.

author: Abraham Cahan
content: Life is much shorter than I imagined it to be.

author: Andy Dick
content: I had no blood relatives till I made some.
